review: It turned our HD TV into a smart tv.  Easy to use.
author: Debbie

review: Good streaming stick. Works better with certain computers, but once you get it going it usually runs well
author: Jake

review: Best little streaming device out there. The only thing that can be considered better than this is its older brother, the Nexus Player.
author: fedecape

review: If you don't have it....get it!
author: Linda Sayan

review: excellet product, it has now become my TV tuner in a way, my kids love watching Youtube on TV, and you can also cast using XBMC, KODI, showbox, All Cast, which is amazing.
author: Bhavin Gandhi

review: The Chromecast is an OK piece of equipment. I did not like streaming things like Netflix. It was really buggy and clunky and had issues. The price point is great and in theory it's a great product but execution was lacking. If you want to share photos on a large screen from your computer or something like that then you might like this. Running it from a phone was not fun. I love Google and pretty much everything they create but this one a a bit of a miss.
author: JeronimoHIllam

review: I have a Vizio TV and I cannot get it to connect and if it does connect it will not stream from my phone a note 3 galaxy this product is not what I expected it to be if I could give less than 1 star I would from my experience not worth wasting your money
author: Hector Martinez
